00091 void MPU_ConfigureRegion(const MPU_RegionInit_TypeDef *init)
00092 {
00093   EFM_ASSERT(init->regionNo < ((MPU->TYPE & MPU_TYPE_DREGION_Msk) >>
00094                                 MPU_TYPE_DREGION_Pos));
00095 
00096   MPU->RNR = init->regionNo;
00097 
00098   if (init->regionEnable)
00099   {
00100     EFM_ASSERT(!(init->baseAddress & ~MPU_RBAR_ADDR_Msk));
00101     EFM_ASSERT(init->tex <= 0x7);
00102 
00103     MPU->RBAR = init->baseAddress;
00104     MPU->RASR = ((init->disableExec ? 1 : 0)   << MPU_RASR_XN_Pos)
00105                 | (init->accessPermission      << MPU_RASR_AP_Pos)
00106                 | (init->tex                   << MPU_RASR_TEX_Pos)
00107                 | ((init->shareable   ? 1 : 0) << MPU_RASR_S_Pos)
00108                 | ((init->cacheable   ? 1 : 0) << MPU_RASR_C_Pos)
00109                 | ((init->bufferable  ? 1 : 0) << MPU_RASR_B_Pos)
00110                 | (init->srd                   << MPU_RASR_SRD_Pos)
00111                 | (init->size                  << MPU_RASR_SIZE_Pos)
00112                 | (1                           << MPU_RASR_ENABLE_Pos);
00113   }
00114   else
00115   {
00116     MPU->RBAR = 0;
00117     MPU->RASR = 0;
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00124 #endif /* defined(__MPU_PRESENT) && (__MPU_PRESENT == 1) */
